# vpsie_sshkey (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vpsie_sshkey" "example" {
  name        = "my-ssh-key"
  private_key = "ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAAB..."
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `private_key` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_by` (String)
- `created_on` (String)
- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `identifier` (String)
